snippet.title: Crysis 2 - Story Trailer
snippet.description: This isn't a war ordinary humans can win. From Lingshan to the streets of Manhattan, Crysis 2  picks up the events of the original game and unravels a vast conspiracy against the backdrop of apocalyptic war.  Prophet must master the powers of the Nanosuit to Be Strong, Be Fast, Be Invisible and Be The Weapon -- and mankind's last hope.
